modelDescriptions.name: gemma2
modelDescriptions.description: General use, supposedly better than llama3. Context length of 8,192 tokens.

modelDescriptions.name: llama3
modelDescriptions.description: General use. Context length of 8,192 tokens.

modelDescriptions.name: qwen2
modelDescriptions.description: Good for coding and math. Context length of 128k tokens.

modelDescriptions.name: nomic-embed-text
modelDescriptions.description: High-performing open embedding model. Context length of 8,192 tokens.

modelDescriptions.name: llava
modelDescriptions.description: Vision model, generates text description of an image. Image resolution up to 1344px in length or height.
